001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
005import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format.IPathFormatter;
006import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidTypeFunctionException;
007import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IItemType;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IKindTest;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyDefinition;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyInstance;
012
013import java.net.URI;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
017
018/**
019 * A Metapath node valued item representing a Metaschema module assembly.
020 */
021public interface IAssemblyNodeItem extends IModelNodeItem<IAssemblyDefinition, IAssemblyInstance> {
022  @NonNull
023  static IItemType type() {
024    return IItemType.assembly();
025  }
026
027  @Override
028  default IKindTest<IAssemblyNodeItem> getType() {
029    StaticContext staticContext = getStaticContext();
030    return IItemType.assembly(
031        getQName(),
032        getDefinition().getDefinitionQName().toEQName(staticContext),
033        staticContext);
034  }
035
036  @Override
037  default NodeItemKind getNodeItemKind() {
038    return NodeItemKind.ASSEMBLY;
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  default IAssemblyNodeItem getNodeItem() {
043    return this;
044  }
045
046  @Override
047  @Nullable
048  default URI getBaseUri() {
049    INodeItem parent = getParentNodeItem();
050    return parent == null ? null : parent.getBaseUri();
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  default String format(@NonNull IPathFormatter formatter) {
055    return formatter.formatAssembly(this);
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  default IAnyAtomicItem toAtomicItem() {
060    throw new InvalidTypeFunctionException(InvalidTypeFunctionException.DATA_ITEM_IS_FUNCTION, this);
061  }
062
063  @Override
064  default <CONTEXT, RESULT> RESULT accept(@NonNull INodeItemVisitor<CONTEXT, RESULT> visitor, CONTEXT context) {
065    return visitor.visitAssembly(this, context);
066  }
067}
